info: Stats through Kills.  A mod that allows your stats to increase by killing zombies.
name: STATS_THROUGH_KILLS

info: Disables robot spawning from alerts and from being wanted.
name: DISABLE_ROBOT_RESPONSE

info: The maximum amount of produce that can be harvested from a plant.
name: MAX_HARVEST_COUNT

info: Disable additional spawn of large groups of monsters fighting each other on swamps.
name: DISABLE_ANIMAL_CLASH

info: A scaling factor that determines density of wild, formerly domesticated and mutated animal spawns.
name: SPAWN_ANIMAL_DENSITY

info: Enables CBM slots mechanics. If true CBM slots are enabled.
name: CBM_SLOTS_ENABLED

info: Emulation of zombie hordes.  Zombie spawn points wander around cities and may go to noise.  Must reset world directory after changing for it to take effect.
name: WANDER_SPAWNS

info: A scaling factor that determines how often creatures spawn from rotting material.
name: CARRION_SPAWNRATE

info: Allowed point pools for character generation.
default: Default: any - Values: any, multi_pool, no_freeform
name: CHARACTER_POINT_POOLS

info: Determines the movement rate of monsters.  A higher value increases monster speed and a lower reduces it.  Requires world reset.
name: MONSTER_SPEED

info: A scaling factor that determines density of item spawns.
name: ITEM_SPAWNRATE

info: The amount of moves gained per dex above SPEEDYDEX_MIN_DEX
name: SPEEDYDEX_DEX_SPEED

info: A scaling factor that determines density of dynamic NPC spawns.
name: NPC_DENSITY

info: Morale penalty for filthy clothing.  If true, wearing filthy clothing will cause morale penalties.  Doesn't make sense if FILTHY_CLOTHES option is false.
name: FILTHY_MORALE

info: A number determining how large cities are.  0 disables cities, roads and any scenario requiring a city start.
name: CITY_SIZE

info: A scaling factor that determines the time between monster upgrades.  A higher number means slower evolution.  Set to 0.00 to turn off monster upgrades.
name: MONSTER_UPGRADE_FACTOR

info: Disables tracking vitamins in food items.  If true, disables vitamin tracking and vitamin disorders.
name: NO_VITAMINS

info: Infected wounds from filthy clothing.  If true, getting hit in a body part covered in filthy clothing may cause infections.  Doesn't make sense if FILTHY_CLOTHES option is false.
name: FILTHY_WOUNDS

info: If true, static NPCs will spawn at pre-defined locations. Requires world reset.
name: STATIC_NPC

info: Season length, in days.  Warning: Very little other than the duration of seasons scales with this value, so adjusting it may cause nonsensical results.
name: SEASON_LENGTH

info: ( WIP feature ) Determines terrain, shops, plants, and more.
name: DEFAULT_REGION

info: Enables sleep deprivation mechanics. If true, stimulants will only help you so far, and you might have to enforce proper sleep hygiene for a while.
name: SLEEP_DEPRIVATION

info: A scaling factor that determines density of monster spawns.
name: SPAWN_DENSITY

info: Keep the initial season for ever.
name: ETERNAL_SEASON

info: If true, spawn zombies at shelters.  Makes the starting game a lot harder.
name: BLACK_ROAD

info: How many days after the cataclysm the player spawns. Day 0 is the day of the cataclysm. Can be overridden by scenarios. Increasing this will cause food rot and monster evolution to advance.
name: SPAWN_DELAY

info: Sets the time of construction in percents.  '50' is two times faster than default, '200' is two times longer.  '0' automatically scales construction time to match the world's season length.
name: CONSTRUCTION_SCALING

info: If true, radiation causes the player to mutate.
name: RAD_MUTATION

info: Determines how much damage monsters can take.  A higher value makes monsters more resilient and a lower makes them more flimsy.  Requires world reset.
name: MONSTER_RESILIENCE

info: The minimum dex required for speedydex mod to add speed
name: SPEEDYDEX_MIN_DEX

info: Initial starting time of day on character generation.
name: INITIAL_TIME

info: A boolean specifically for Crazy Cataclysm.
name: CRAZY

info: If true, the game will randomly spawn NPCs during gameplay.
name: RANDOM_NPC

info: A number determining how far apart cities are.  Warning, small numbers lead to very slow mapgen.
name: CITY_SPACING

info: Determines whether starting NPCs should spawn, and if they do, how exactly.
default: Default: scenario - Values: never, always, scenario
name: STARTING_NPC

info: Controls what migrations are applied for legacy worlds
name: CORE_VERSION

info: Set base hunger rate per 5 minutes. Default: 1.0
name: PLAYER_HUNGER_RATE

info: If true, downstairs will be placed directly above upstairs, even if this results in uglier maps.
name: ALIGN_STAIRS

info: Value that adds to weapon dispersion per weapon damage value.
name: DISPERSION_PER_GUN_DAMAGE

info: Sets max stamina value of the player.
name: PLAYER_MAX_STAMINA

info: Sets base stamina regeneration per turn of the player. May be used as an offset in stamina draining effects.
name: PLAYER_BASE_STAMINA_REGEN_RATE

info: Sets base stamina burn per 100 moves of the walking player.
name: PLAYER_BASE_STAMINA_BURN_RATE

info: If true, experimental z-level maps will be enabled.  Turn this off if you experience excessive slowdown.
name: ZLEVELS

info: Makes autodoc operations completely safe, independent of the players skill.
name: SAFE_AUTODOC

info: Set base fatigue rate per 5 minutes. Default: 1.0
name: PLAYER_FATIGUE_RATE

info: Set base thirst rate per 5 minutes. Default: 1.0
name: PLAYER_THIRST_RATE

info: Set base player healing rate per turn. Default: 0.0001
name: PLAYER_HEALING_RATE

info: Set base NPC healing rate per turn. Default: 0.0001
name: NPC_HEALING_RATE

info: Disables vehicle part faults.  If true, disables vehicle part faults, vehicle parts will be totally reliable unless destroyed, and can only be repaired via replacement.
name: NO_FAULTS

info: Handling of game world when last character dies.
default: Default: keep - Values: keep, reset, delete, query
name: WORLD_END

info: How many days into the year the cataclysm occurred. Day 0 is Spring 1. Can be overridden by scenarios. This does not advance food rot or monster evolution.
name: INITIAL_DAY

info: Value that divides total weapon dipsersion. 15 means that weapons became 15 times more acurate than default.
name: GUN_DISPERSION_DIVIDER

info: If true, zombies will drop filthy clothing.
name: FILTHY_CLOTHES

info: Permits manual self-installation of bionics.
name: MANUAL_BIONIC_INSTALLATION

info: Disables tracking food, thirst and ( partially ) fatigue for NPCs. If true, NPCs won't need to eat or drink and will only get tired enough to sleep, not to get penalties.
name: NO_NPC_FOOD
